verses.verse: Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time, <S%H8145><s%> while he was still <S%H5750><s%> confined <S%H6113><s%> in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the guard, <S%H4307><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who made <S%H6213><s%> [the earth,] the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who formed <S%H3335><s%> it to establish <S%H3559><s%> it, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is His name, <S%H8034><s%>

'Call <S%H7121><s%> to Me, and I will answer <S%H6030><s%> you, and I will tell <S%H5046><s%> you great <S%H1419><s%> and mighty <S%H1219><s%> things, <S%H1219><s%> which you do not know. <S%H3045><s%>'

"For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of this <S%H384><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and concerning <S%H5921><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> which are broken <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> [to make a defense] against <S%H413><s%> the siege <S%H5550><s%> mounds <S%H5550><s%> and against <S%H413><s%> the sword, <S%H2719><s%>

'While [they] are coming <S%H935><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> and to fill <S%H4390><s%> them with the corpses <S%H6297><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I have slain <S%H5221><s%> in My anger <S%H639><s%> and in My wrath, <S%H2534><s%> and I have hidden <S%H5641><s%> My face <S%H6440><s%> from this <S%H384><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> their wickedness: <S%H9567><s%>

'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will bring <S%H5927><s%> to it health <S%H724><s%> and healing, <S%H4832><s%> and I will heal <S%H7495><s%> them; and I will reveal <S%H1540><s%> to them an abundance <S%H6283><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> and truth. <S%H571><s%>

'And I will restore <S%H7725><s%> the fortunes <S%H7622><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the fortunes <S%H7622><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and I will rebuild <S%H1129><s%> them as they were at first. <S%H7223><s%>

'And I will cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them from all <S%H3605><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against Me, and I will pardon <S%H5545><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their iniquities <S%H5771><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against Me, and by which <S%H834><s%> they have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against Me.

'And it shall be to Me a name <S%H8034><s%> of joy, <S%H8342><s%> praise, <S%H8416><s%> and glory <S%H8597><s%> before all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the good <S%H9186><s%> that I do <S%H6213><s%> for them, and they shall fear <S%H6342><s%> and tremble <S%H7264><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the good <S%H9186><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the peace <S%H7965><s%> that I make <S%H6213><s%> for it.'

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yet <S%H5750><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> there shall be heard <S%H8085><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> you say, <S%H559><s%> "It is a waste, <S%H2720><s%> without <S%H369><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> "[that is,] in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and in the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> that are desolate, <S%H8074><s%> without <S%H369><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%>

the voice <S%H6963><s%> of joy <S%H8342><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of gladness, <S%H8057><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the bride, <S%H3618><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of those who say, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is good, <S%H2896><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting <S%H5769><s%>"; [and of those] who bring <S%H935><s%> a thank <S%H8426><s%> offering <S%H8426><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> For I will restore <S%H7725><s%> the fortunes <S%H7622><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> as they were at first, <S%H7223><s%> 'says <S%H559><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> 'There shall again <S%H5750><s%> be in this <S%H2088><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> which is waste, <S%H2720><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H369><s%> man <S%H120><s%> or beast, <S%H929><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> its cities, <S%H5892><s%> a habitation <S%H5116><s%> of shepherds <S%H7462><s%> who rest <S%H7257><s%> their flocks. <S%H6629><s%>

'In the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> country, <S%H2022><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the lowland, <S%H8219><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Negev, <S%H5045><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> in the environs <S%H5439><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> shall again <S%H5750><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> under <S%H5921><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the one who numbers <S%H4487><s%> them,' says <S%H559><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> are coming, <S%H935><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'when I will fulfill <S%H6965><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

'In those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and at that time <S%H6256><s%> I will cause a righteous <S%H6666><s%> Branch <S%H6780><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> to spring <S%H6779><s%> forth; <S%H6779><s%> and He shall execute <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

'In those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be saved, <S%H3467><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in safety; <S%H983><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> is [the name] by which <S%H834><s%> she shall be called: <S%H7121><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is our righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>'

"For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'David <S%H1732><s%> shall never <S%H3808><s%> lack <S%H3772><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> to sit <S%H3427><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

and the Levitical <S%H3881><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> shall never <S%H3808><s%> lack <S%H3772><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Me to offer <S%H5927><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, <S%H5930><s%> to burn <S%H6999><s%> grain offerings, <S%H4503><s%> and to prepare <S%H6213><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> continually. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>' "
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'If <S%H518><s%> you can break <S%H6565><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> for the day, <S%H3117><s%> and My covenant <S%H1285><s%> for the night, <S%H3915><s%> so that day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> will not be at their appointed <S%H6256><s%> time, <S%H6256><s%>

then My covenant <S%H1285><s%> may also <S%H1571><s%> be broken <S%H6565><s%> with David <S%H1732><s%> My servant <S%H5650><s%> that he shall not have <S%H1961><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> to reign <S%H4427><s%> on his throne, <S%H3678><s%> and with the Levitical <S%H3881><s%> priests, <S%H3548><s%> My ministers. <S%H8334><s%>

'As the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> be counted, <S%H5608><s%> and the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> be measured, <S%H4058><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> the descendants <S%H2233><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> My servant <S%H5650><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> who minister <S%H8334><s%> to Me.' "
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Have you not observed <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> have spoken, <S%H1696><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'The two <S%H8147><s%> families <S%H4940><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> chose, <S%H977><s%> He has rejected <S%H3988><s%> them'? Thus they despise <S%H5006><s%> My people, <S%H5971><s%> no <S%H4480><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> are they as a nation <S%H1471><s%> in their sight. <S%H6440><s%>

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'If <S%H518><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> [for] day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> [stand] not, [and] the fixed <S%H2708><s%> patterns <S%H2708><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> I have not established, <S%H7760><s%>

then <S%H1571><s%> I would reject <S%H3988><s%> the descendants <S%H2233><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> My servant, <S%H5650><s%> not taking <S%H3947><s%> from his descendants <S%H2233><s%> rulers <S%H4910><s%> over <S%H413><s%> the descendants <S%H2233><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> But I will restore <S%H7725><s%> their fortunes <S%H7622><s%> and will have <S%H7355><s%> mercy <S%H7355><s%> on them.' "
